heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny. Highs in the mid to upper 70s, some lower 70s north. North to northeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mainly clear. Areas of valley fog. Lows from the mid 40s to around 50, around 40 in northern cold hollows, and low to mid 50s near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: Some valley fog early to mid morning, then sunny. Highs from the mid 70s to around 80. Wind variable to northeast at around 5 mph.
